fields.name: Urban E-Commuter Pro
fields.description: Modern electric bike perfect for city commuting with 50km range and integrated lights. Features a sleek design and comfortable riding position for daily urban travel.

fields.name: Mountain E-Explorer
fields.description: Powerful electric mountain bike with robust motor assistance for challenging trails. Built for adventure with premium suspension and all-terrain capabilities.

fields.name: City E-Cruiser
fields.description: Comfortable electric cruiser bike with step-through frame design. Perfect for leisurely rides with excellent battery life and smooth operation.

fields.name: Performance E-Road
fields.description: High-performance electric road bike for serious cyclists. Lightweight carbon frame with advanced motor integration for enhanced speed and efficiency.

fields.name: Folding E-Compact
fields.description: Compact folding electric bike ideal for urban storage and transport. Features quick-fold mechanism and powerful motor in a space-saving design.

fields.name: Cargo E-Hauler
fields.description: Heavy-duty electric cargo bike for family transport and deliveries. Extra-long frame with cargo capacity and stable handling for practical use.

fields.name: Fat Tire E-Adventure
fields.description: All-terrain electric fat bike for sand, snow, and rough terrain. Wide tires and powerful motor provide excellent traction and stability.

fields.name: Vintage E-Classic
fields.description: Retro-styled electric bike combining classic aesthetics with modern technology. Elegant design with integrated battery and vintage appeal.

fields.name: Trail Master Pro
fields.description: Professional mountain bike designed for serious trail riding. Full suspension with premium components for maximum performance on challenging terrain.

fields.name: Enduro Beast
fields.description: Heavy-duty enduro mountain bike built for aggressive downhill riding. Robust frame and advanced suspension system for extreme trail conditions.

fields.name: Cross Country Racer
fields.description: Lightweight cross-country mountain bike optimized for racing and long-distance rides. Efficient pedaling and responsive handling for competitive performance.

fields.name: All-Mountain Explorer
fields.description: Versatile all-mountain bike suitable for various trail conditions. Balanced geometry and reliable components for adventurous mountain biking.

fields.name: Hardtail Climber
fields.description: Efficient hardtail mountain bike designed for climbing and technical trails. Lightweight frame with precise handling for skilled riders.

fields.name: Downhill Destroyer
fields.description: Specialized downhill mountain bike for extreme descents and bike park riding. Heavy-duty construction with maximum suspension travel.

fields.name: Trail Starter
fields.description: Entry-level mountain bike perfect for beginners exploring trail riding. Reliable components and comfortable geometry for learning mountain biking skills.

fields.name: Plus Size Adventurer
fields.description: Mountain bike with plus-size tires for enhanced traction and comfort. Ideal for riders seeking extra stability and cushioning on trails.

fields.name: Aero Speed Demon
fields.description: Aerodynamic road bike designed for maximum speed and efficiency. Carbon fiber frame with wind-cutting geometry for competitive racing.

fields.name: Endurance Cruiser
fields.description: Comfortable endurance road bike for long-distance touring and sportive events. Relaxed geometry with premium comfort features.

fields.name: Gravel Adventure
fields.description: Versatile gravel road bike for mixed-terrain adventures. Wider tire clearance and stable handling for exploring beyond paved roads.

fields.name: Classic Steel Tourer
fields.description: Traditional steel frame touring bike built for reliability and comfort. Classic design with modern components for long-distance travel.

fields.name: Time Trial Rocket
fields.description: Specialized time trial bike for individual racing events. Extreme aerodynamic design with aggressive positioning for maximum speed.

fields.name: Urban Commuter
fields.description: Practical road bike designed for daily city commuting. Durable construction with features for urban riding and weather protection.

fields.name: Cyclocross Racer
fields.description: Competitive cyclocross bike for off-road racing and training. Lightweight frame with features for carrying and obstacle navigation.

fields.name: Entry Level Roadie
fields.description: Affordable entry-level road bike perfect for beginners. Quality components and comfortable geometry for learning road cycling fundamentals.

fields.name: Pro Racing Helmet
fields.description: Lightweight aerodynamic helmet with advanced ventilation system. MIPS technology for enhanced protection during high-speed cycling.

fields.name: Cycling Jersey Pro
fields.description: Professional cycling jersey with moisture-wicking fabric and aerodynamic fit. Three rear pockets and reflective elements for safety.

fields.name: Padded Cycling Shorts
fields.description: High-quality cycling shorts with premium chamois padding. Compression fit and seamless construction for maximum comfort on long rides.

fields.name: LED Light Set
fields.description: Powerful LED front and rear light set for safe night riding. USB rechargeable with multiple brightness modes and long battery life.

fields.name: Cycling Gloves
fields.description: Padded cycling gloves with gel inserts for comfort and grip. Breathable fabric with easy-pull tabs for convenient removal.

fields.name: Frame Bag
fields.description: Aerodynamic frame bag for storing essentials during rides. Water-resistant construction with easy access zipper and secure mounting system.

fields.name: Water Bottle Set
fields.description: Insulated water bottles with matching cage set. BPA-free construction with easy-squeeze design and leak-proof cap system.

fields.name: Bike Computer GPS
fields.description: Advanced GPS bike computer with navigation and performance tracking. Color display with smartphone connectivity and long battery life.

fields.name: Cycling Shoes
fields.description: Professional cycling shoes with carbon sole and BOA closure system. Lightweight design with excellent power transfer and comfort.

fields.name: Multi-Tool Kit
fields.description: Comprehensive multi-tool kit with 16 functions including hex keys, screwdrivers, and chain tool. Compact design for emergency repairs.

fields.name: Bike Lock Security
fields.description: Heavy-duty U-lock with cable extension for maximum security. Hardened steel construction with pick-resistant cylinder mechanism.

fields.name: Cycling Sunglasses
fields.description: Sport sunglasses with interchangeable lenses and UV protection. Lightweight frame with anti-slip nose pads and temple grips.

fields.name: Carbon Wheelset
fields.description: Lightweight carbon fiber wheelset for road bikes. Aerodynamic profile with ceramic bearings for reduced rolling resistance and enhanced performance.

fields.name: Hydraulic Disc Brakes
fields.description: High-performance hydraulic disc brake set with excellent stopping power. Consistent performance in all weather conditions with easy maintenance.

fields.name: Electronic Shifting System
fields.description: Precision electronic shifting system with wireless connectivity. Instant gear changes with customizable settings via smartphone app.

fields.name: Suspension Fork
fields.description: Advanced suspension fork with adjustable compression and rebound damping. Lightweight construction with lockout feature for climbing efficiency.

fields.name: Carbon Handlebars
fields.description: Lightweight carbon fiber handlebars with ergonomic shape. Vibration damping properties for improved comfort on long rides.

fields.name: Power Meter Crankset
fields.description: Precision power meter crankset for training and performance analysis. Dual-sided measurement with accurate power and cadence data.

fields.name: Tubeless Tire Set
fields.description: High-performance tubeless tires with puncture protection. Lower rolling resistance and improved grip for enhanced riding experience.

fields.name: Chain and Cassette Kit
fields.description: Premium chain and cassette combination for smooth shifting performance. Durable construction with extended wear life and precise engagement.

fields.name: Pedal System Clipless
fields.description: Professional clipless pedal system with adjustable release tension. Lightweight design with excellent power transfer and easy entry/exit.

fields.name: Saddle Performance
fields.description: Ergonomic performance saddle with pressure relief channel. Carbon rails and lightweight construction for competitive cycling comfort.

fields.description: Modern electric bike perfect for city commuting with 50km range and integrated lights. End of season clearance pricing on this popular model!
